                            return '<a>'+(index+1)+'</a>';
                        }")
opts <- settings(
  dots = TRUE,
  initialSlide = 8,
  customPaging = cP1,
  speed = 0,
  adaptiveHeight = FALSE)


filenames = list.files(path = 'Figures/Syntax/', 
                    pattern = 'transition table - bird', full.names = T)


slickR(obj = filenames, height = "70%", width = "70%", padding = 0) + opts
